metadata.Title: CVE-2012-6532 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: (1) Zend_Dom, (2) Zend_Feed, (3) Zend_Soap, and (4) Zend_XmlRpc in ZendFramework 1.x before 1.11.13 and 1.12.x before 1.12.0 allow remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) via recursive orcircular references in an XML entity definition in an XML DOCTYPEdeclaration, aka an XML Entity Expansion (XEE) attack.

criterions.comment: zend-framework: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
